level.heading: Post-employment benefits.
level.text: An annuitant may elect to convert group life insurance benefits authorized in § 1-622.03 to an individual policy upon separation from service.

level.heading: Cross References
level.text: Merit system, effective date provisions, see § 1-636.02.
Temporary Assistance for Needy Families program (TANF), workers' compensation coverage, see § 4-205.19k.
